quote: There is peace even in the storm. – Vincent van Gogh
fact: A signature is called a John Hancock because he signed the Declaration of Independence. Only 2 people signed the declaration of independence on July 4. The Last person signed 2 years later.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: How did Darth Vader know what Luke was getting for Christmas? He felt his presents.
